website_summaries.verdict: A colorful, fun swimming pool basketball set made of weather-resistant materials.
cons: Pricier than some other offerings by the same company

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't require tightening/repositioning...
customer_reviews.text: Great hoop. The vertical post that the hoop hangs from is square instead of round, so the hoop doesn't rotate and/or require tightening or repositioning.
customer_reviews.author: Angela F

customer_reviews.title: Ok product. A little pricey for the quality
customer_reviews.text: Backboard is made of styrofoam. Hoping it holds up. Arrived dented due to poor packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Pole to base did not fit properly.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 stars but the pole did not fit properly into the base. It is sturdy and the family love playing with it, a great addition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a Christmas present for my son and just assembled today. Very easy to put together. All you need is a Phillips head screwdriver and a bike pump for the basket ball. Let’s see how it last for the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Now screws for assembly
customer_reviews.text: So far I just don't like that the hoop came without any screws. Now I have to either return it or go buy my own screws. Would be nice if the directions at least list the size of screws needed. 🤦🏾‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Gigi Forde

customer_reviews.title: Parts Missing
customer_reviews.text: All the screws were missing to assemble. The manufacture does not have replacement screws available. The neck is difficult to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Emerson Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Just received this WITHOUT THE NET OR BALL IN THE BOX!!! Pointless purchase with a replacement not coming for over a month!!! SO DISAPPOINTED!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. Assembly was a challenge as holes didn’t line up properly. Missing washers needed for assembly. Leaked water from the base, which helps keep stationary. Not recommended
customer_reviews.author: Daria N. Ogden

customer_reviews.title: Air ball.
customer_reviews.text: Screw holes don’t line up so hoop won’t screw in right. Base shattered when forcing the basket into it. Send me a new one. I’m not wasting any additional time returning this busted product.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This was obviously a return as the base had visible scratches. In addition, the washers were missing and the screw holes did not line up. Considering the price, you’re better off with a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Woody1266

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Came without the rim, guess I will have to return. Disappointing that there isn’t anyone to get ahold of to simply send a new rim. Swimways told me they don’t make this model anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for teens
customer_reviews.text: Had a little trouble with the assembly. Son loves it. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces, specifically washers and broken.
customer_reviews.text: Product was missing washers to connect the hoop to stand. Then when filled with water there was a crack in the base so water did not hold. Would not recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: Аmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Add dish soap to install into base
customer_reviews.text: Product is great. Tip: use Dawn dish soap to push top into the base. Easy peasy!
customer_reviews.author: Shasta Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Broke when putting together
customer_reviews.text: Base cracked when putting the hoop into the base. Now it won't hold water.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Nitsche

product_meta.title: SwimWays Wet Net Basketball Game
product_meta.description: The Wet Net Basketball from SwimWays is a durable swimming pool basketball game set perfect for everyday water play and for entertaining guests at your next pool party! This durable pool basketball game features an all-weather polycarbonate 28-inch backboard with cool infused graphics kids love. When the base is filled with water it weighs 80 pounds, helping to keep the net secure during game play. Includes a 14-inch rust-proof polypropylene hoop, all-weather net, and a pro-style game ball with inflation needle. No tools are required for assembly so you'll be shooting hoops in no time! Colors and styles may vary. For kids ages 6 and older.
feature_bullets: The Wet Net Basketball from SwimWays is a durable swimming pool basketball game set your kids will love!
Tough 28-inch polycarbonate backboard with cool infused graphics
Base weighs 80 pounds when filled with water to enhance stability during game play
Includes a 14-inch rust-proof polypropylene hoop, all-weather net, and inflatable pro-style ball with inflation needled
No tools are required for assembly

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars55 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
